statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1001;
SELECT ticket_id, user_id, ticket_price, ticket_status FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE concert_id = 2002;
SELECT user_id, ticket_price FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50.00 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold FROM virtual_concert_tickets GROUP BY concert_id HAVING total_tickets_sold > 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE user_id = 123 AND ticket_status = 'available' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, user_id, concert_id FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'sold' GROUP BY concert_id;
SELECT AVG(ticket_price), MAX(ticket_price), MIN(ticket_price) FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE concert_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, SUM(ticket_price) AS total_spent FROM virtual_concert_tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM Tickets GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE concert_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price FROM Tickets;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_id, concert_id, ticket_price FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT concert_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM Tickets GROUP BY concert_id HAVING total_tickets > 5 ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM Concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_code IS NOT NULL ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM Concerts WHERE concert_date > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Concerts WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT concert_name, ticket_price FROM Concerts ORDER BY concert_date ASC, ticket_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT concert_name, Users.first_name FROM Concerts INNER JOIN Tickets ON Concerts.concert_id = Tickets.concert_id INNER JOIN Users ON Tickets.user_id = Users.user_id;

SELECT concert_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM Concerts LEFT JOIN Tickets ON Concerts.concert_id = Tickets.concert_id GROUP BY concert_name HAVING total_tickets > 100 ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
SELECT concert_name, MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price, MIN(ticket_price) AS min_price, AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_price FROM Concerts GROUP BY concert_name HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT concert_name, venue FROM concerts ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE seat_number > 100;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_tickets > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE total_amount >= 50 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT concert_name, venue, ticket_price FROM concerts WHERE ticket_price < 50.00;
SELECT user_id, concert_name, ticket_date FROM tickets WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY ticket_date DESC;
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.seat_number, tr.total_amount FROM tickets t JOIN transactions tr ON t.ticket_id = tr.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM concerts;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM concerts WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT venue_name, address, capacity FROM venues ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date, ticket_price FROM concerts WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT venue_name, address, capacity FROM venues ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS ticket_count FROM tickets GROUP BY user_id HAVING ticket_count > 2;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 100 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
